name: Duality (itch) (Ztrahd)
description:
Multiplayer extreme sci-fi racing, flying down a dual track system runing above and below each other on slick futuristic hover bikes.  Racers can teleport between the two tracks, trigger traps on one level that will effect others both behind you, as well as those on the other track.

This game was made by a team of 5  in one week for the Epic MegaJam 2022.  The theme was "As above, So below".  

We had a lot of fun coming up with and making it, we hope you have fun playing it! 

SAFETY WARNING:  
This game does include a lot of lights and glowing objects and you will be whizzing by them at high speeds.  This may be a possible trigger for seizures if you are prone to them, so please keep that in mind and play safely if you have any history for those.
